full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD PA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG 'DI'I BZLOG BSGYUR SMAN RAG GTOR GSUM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES RTA MGRIN DBANG GA RGYAL PO'I BSKANG BSHAGS BSANGS MCHOD DANG BCAS BYA TSUL DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD STOBS RNAMS DPYOD LDAN PA'I MDZAD PA KHRI PA SANGS RGYAS KYI BSKUL BA LTAR DGON LUNG KHRI BA RNYID PA LHA RAMS PA BSKAL BZANG LHA DBANG GIS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
